Line17.121C9F: It didn't go as they had hoped. Some returned, wounded. Some, like my master, did not return at all. Their armor and their legacy slowly rusting.
VoiceDir1.121C9F: Flat. Educational. Pushing feelings aside. The memory is fresh, but you don't show it.
Line1.121C9F: You're clearly not from around here. (sigh) Maugan's Folly is a Zakarum fort, lost to brigands and the swamp generations ago.
Line15.121C9F: My master, Johanna, gathered a group of crusaders to take it back. To begin our trek back into the swamp in search of Akarat. But...
